data.name: Coonwood
data.detailed_description:
Raccoons?

Do you think raccoons are good? In Coonwood you will understand how much they do not like intruders!

Gameplay

In Coonwood, you will have to play as one of several raccoons or one alien. Playing as raccoons, you need to work together and deal with a common enemy. The gameplay of the alien is more difficult, because playing for him you have to escape alone from angry raccoons.

There are skill branches in the game, they do not depend on the role you play! You can use the same abilities on both the raccoon and the alien. By learning new abilities, you can realize your personal style of combat or defense.

Game Modes

Coonwood has several game modes:
  • Crash - one player plays as an alien, and the others as raccoons. The purpose of this mode is simple, the alien must find a way to send a signal to be rescued. Raccoons must protect their territory and prevent the alien.
  • Traitor - the alien using disguise becomes one of the raccoons and tries to send a signal to his team. The raccoons' goal is to find the traitor and stop him.
  • Hazard - in this mode, the alien ceases to be a victim and becomes a hunter. Raccoons need to stick together and not get caught by the alien.

Playing style

With role-neutral abilities, you can play any style you want. Be an assassin, or attack from the shadows with long-range attacks, run faster than the wind and jump higher than the trees, the decision is yours!

data.short_description: Coonwood is a multiplayer horror game. One player takes on the role of the alien who crashed on an unknown planet. The other players (1-4) play as raccoons. But in the place where they are located, anomalies occur and the characters begin to possess different abilities.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10, 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
